name: Day Of Darkness - A Horror Typing Game
name_original: Day Of Darkness - A Horror Typing Game
description:
MADE FOR THE GAME PARADE 2020 GAME JAM!

Darkness has fallen, and the zombies are rising. Only you can save the day, and seize it from the oncoming horde. All you need is your trusty shotgun, and a high WPM (Words Per a Minute) score!

In this on rails shooter, instead of pointing your shotgun at enemies to kill them. You blow them away by typing out the correct phrase, as quickly as you possibly can before they reach you and eat your brains.

HOW TO PLAY:

Very simple, all you need is your keyboard. You can also cycle through enemies with the use of the left and right arrows on they keyboard. 

Interact with menus with your mouse.

Game is also case sensitive

CREDITS:

Game Designed & Programmed by Adam Tedder

Models & Textures from Quixel

Additional Textures from CGTextures

Character Models & Animations from Mixamo

Music by Universal Production Music

Additional Assets from Unity Asset Store
